reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty, well-made, and comfortable, appreciating its perfect fit and great color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big / dad couldn’t keep
items.body: This is a great sweater but if you need a small I found it was too big! Unfortunately there is no xs but if you like your sweaters a little bigger than it’s a good quality. Read more
items.author: HOLLY

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Got Complements!
items.body: I ordered this beautiful sweater in the brown color and it fits perfectly and the color is just like the picture. It's really good quality and it's very soft and comfortable. It was about 50 something outside and I wore this sweater with a jacket and it was the perfect weight and thickness. Read more
items.author: Patti Scott

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: I sized up after reading reviews and ended up returning for my usual size. It is thin and not made super great, but it’s serving the purpose I bought it for. I’m very tall and the sleeves are not anywhere near close to being long enough (23” from shoulder seam of the size small) In fact, they are 3/4 length on me and it looks ok. I wanted this to reach just under my sports bra after working out and that is exactly where it reaches so it’s very cropped. Again though, I’m very tall. Read more
items.author: Shoe Heart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for petite
items.body: Perfect for petite people! Great with high waist jeans. Light weight but warm. Washed fine, but I hung it to dry to keep shape best. Soft and pretty. Read more
items.author: KCO

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars acrylic is itchy
items.body: Love the burgundy color. Sleeves were too short for me. My sleeve length is 24" and acrylic is itchy on me. Read more
items.author: Nancy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Good quality and fit Read more
items.author: melanie singer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars ZAFUL Women’s Cable Cropped Sweater Long Sleeve Crewneck Sweater.
items.body: I was désappointée when I received the ZAFUL women’sCable Cropped Sweater. I ordered a size small and was too big for me. The knitting is very loose and not flattering on me. Read more
items.author: Madeleine Stutzman

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great fit but cheap
items.body: I received my sweater today, size small. I'm 5'6, I weigh 120. I love the brick red color and the length, it's not too long. If you are looking for a warm sweater for fall or winter, this is not it! I will definetley wear a top under the sweater to keep me warm . The quality is not as expected but I am keeping the sweater. Read more
items.author: Karina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 6-khaki, 9-red, 1-deep Blue, 6-dusty Pink, 2-gray Blue, 0-beige, 1-brick Red, 6-dark Pink, 6-dusty Blue, 1-black, 1-chocolate, 2-teal, 1-light Blue, 9-gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
